mapper.select: SELECT mc.MEM_ID , mc.COUPON_ID , c.COUPON_CODE -- 쿠폰코드 , c.COUPON_NAME , c.DISCOUNT_PERCENT , c.DISCOUNT_AMOUNT , mc.ISSUE_DATE -- 발급날짜 , c.C_EXPIRY_DATE -- 유효기간 , c.COUPON_STATUS -- 쿠폰상태(1:사용가능,2:사용불가) , mc.COUPON_ISUSED -- 쿠폰사용여부(1:미사용,2:사용완료) FROM MYCOUPON mc JOIN COUPONINFO c ON c.COUPON_ID = mc.COUPON_ID WHERE mc.MEM_ID = #{sId} AND c.COUPON_STATUS = 1 AND mc.COUPON_ISUSED = 1

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYCOUPON (MEM_ID, COUPON_ID, ISSUE_DATE, COUPON_STATUS, COUPON_ISUSED) SELECT #{mem_id} , ci.COUPON_ID , sysdate() , ci.COUPON_STATUS , 1 -- 조회한 쿠폰코드가 있을경우 1로 지정 FROM COUPONINFO ci WHERE ci.COUPON_CODE = #{coupon_code} -- 입력한 쿠폰코드 AND ci.COUPON_STATUS != 2 -- 쿠폰상태가 2이면 삽입불가 조건 AND NOT EXISTS ( -- 이미 보유한 쿠폰이면 삽입불가 조건 SELECT 1 FROM MYCOUPON mc WHERE mc.COUPON_ID = ci.COUPON_ID AND mc.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} );
